name: Layla

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: What are you doing here? This is our casino, punk.

topics.topic_text: Hey, just checking the place out. Now I'll just be on my way...
topics.response_text: We don't take kindly to tourists on our turf. You're gonna need to pay a fine if you want to leave in one piece. 100 caps should cover it.

topics.topic_text: Okay. Here.
topics.response_text: Thanks.  We're leaving now, we don't want no more trouble.

topics.topic_text: I don't have that many caps.
topics.response_text: Alright, since you look new and didn't know better, we'll cut you some slack.  50 caps.

topics.topic_text: But I don't even have that much.
topics.response_text: That's alright, we'll take what we can from your body before the law shows up.

topics.topic_text: <Pay 50 caps> Okay, here.
topics.response_text: Thanks, Let's get out of here boys.

topics.topic_text: <Attack> I guess I'll serve as their justice then.
topics.response_text: You won't live to regret those words!

topics.topic_text: Punk?  Thats my line.
topics.response_text: Heh, you've got moxy, buddy, but we don't take kindly to tourists on our turf. 100 caps should cover this trip into our territory.

topics.topic_text: Are you deserters?
topics.response_text: I like to think that we are Prisoners Of War that managed to escape before capture.

topics.topic_text: I guess I can understand that.
topics.response_text: We figured we'd make some money in New Vegas and then beat feet.

topics.topic_text: <Attack> Well then. It sounds like there might be a bounty on your heads.
topics.response_text: Perhaps, but you won't be the one to collect!

topics.topic_text: So that's it? You've resorted to robbing and raiding to solve your problems?
topics.response_text: Our luck has gone south since we lost all of our money gambling in Vegas. We didn't go AWOL from duty to become raiders.

topics.topic_text: <Attack> Well, I think your luck just ran out.
topics.response_text: Looks like we've got a wannabe hero on our hands, boys.

topics.topic_text: Why not just turn yourselves in?
topics.response_text: No fucking way. We're deserters now, the NCR isn't going to throw us a ticker-tape parade for going home.

topics.topic_text: You're right.  You're totally screwed.
topics.response_text: I'm getting tired of your chatter. Hand over 100 caps, or we start using you for target practice.

topics.topic_text: Your turf? I guess the news hasn't reached you yet, Primm has law again.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Fuck, we lose again.

topics.topic_text: <Attack> Well, in that case, maybe I'll do the town a favor and take you down.
topics.response_text: So be it. Perhaps your corpse will be better at coughing up the caps...

topics.topic_text: Well, they do have a few more troops than the four of you...
topics.response_text: No biggie there. We've been avoiding the patrols and staying low key until this mess.

topics.topic_text: It would be safer to run and find someplace to hide.
topics.response_text: Maybe you're right. Come on, boys, lets get the hell out of here before the law shows up.

topics.topic_text: <Attack> Murdering deserters. Well, I think I've heard enough.
topics.response_text: And it'll be the last thing you hear!

topics.topic_text: I imagine the NCR doesn't deal with deserters kindly.
topics.response_text: Yeah, if we see the NCR, they'll be waiting for us with a bullet to the brain pan.

description:
Layla is a 28 year-old Caucasian Female.

A weary-looking woman in her late 20s with short, unkempt brown hair and tired eyes that constantly scan her surroundings. She wears scavenged NCR fatigues that are now faded and dirty, stripped of any identifying marks. Her posture is tense, as if expecting danger at any moment, and she carries a worn 10mm pistol at her hip.

Layla's Personality: Pragmatic and cautious, Layla has become hardened by her experiences in the NCR and the wasteland. She's protective of her small group of deserters and willing to do what's necessary to survive, though she still carries the weight of her desertion. She's resourceful and quick-thinking, having learned to navigate the dangers of the Mojave.

Layla's Backstory: Layla served in the New California Republic Army for several years, witnessing the brutal war against Caesar's Legion firsthand. The constant threat of capture, torture, and execution by the legionaries took its toll on her and her unit. After a particularly harrowing engagement near the Colorado River, Layla and three of her fellow soldiers made the difficult decision to desert. They abandoned their uniforms, weapons, and any ties to the NCR, heading south into the Mojave. Their journey brought them to Primm, where they hoped to lie low. However, their meager savings were quickly lost gambling in New Vegas, leaving them stranded and desperate. Now, Layla leads her small group in Primm, trying to come up with ways to generate income while avoiding attention from both NCR authorities and Legion scouts.
